text: Obsessed with my new Zara oversized blazer! Got it for $89.99. Link in bio! #OOTD
This Reformation midi dress is EVERYTHING! Wearing size S, fits true to size. Use code STYLE15 for 15% off at https://ref.com/dress-midi
These Nike Air Max 90s in white are a wardrobe staple! Grabbed them on sale for $110. Check my LTK shop for direct link!
Can't stop wearing my Levi's 501 jeans. Classic vintage fit, 100% cotton. Size 28x30 for reference.
Loving this H&M Studio collection trench coat! €129 and such good quality. Available online now.
My Jacquemus Le Chiquito bag is finally here! Saved up for months. Worth every penny at $570. Swipe to shop via @shopltk
Wearing: vintage Chanel blazer (thrifted!), Mango leather pants ($79), and Bottega Veneta boots. Full outfit details on my blog.
This Skims bodysuit in 'onyx' size M is so comfortable! Kim really delivered. Use my code FASHION20 at checkout -> skims.com
